member.name: T:Account
member.summary: Class representing a bank account. Demonstrates properties with private setters.

member.name: P:Account.AccountNo
member.summary: Gets the account number. Can only be set internally.

member.name: M:Account.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructor for Account class.

member.name: T:Animal
member.summary: Base class representing an animal. Demonstrates single inheritance.

member.name: M:Animal.Eat
member.summary: Method for the animal to eat.

member.name: T:AnimalOverride
member.summary: Base class for animals with virtual method. Demonstrates method overriding.

member.name: M:AnimalOverride.Sound
member.summary: Virtual method that can be overridden by derived classes. Makes a generic animal sound.

member.name: T:Car
member.summary: Derived class representing a car. Inherits from Vehicle and adds its own method. Demonstrates basic inheritance.

member.name: M:Car.Drive
member.summary: Drives the car. This is a method specific to the Car class.

member.name: T:CarComposition
member.summary: Class representing a car using composition. Contains an Engine object instead of inheriting. Demonstrates composition over inheritance.

member.name: F:CarComposition.engine
member.summary: Engine instance used by the car.

member.name: M:CarComposition.Drive
member.summary: Drives the car by starting the engine and driving.

member.name: T:ChildHiding
member.summary: Derived class that hides the parent's Show method. Demonstrates method hiding using 'new' keyword.

member.name: M:ChildHiding.Show
member.summary: Hides the parent's Show method. Uses 'new' to explicitly hide instead of override.

member.name: T:ChildSealed
member.summary: Derived class that seals the overridden method. Demonstrates sealed override methods.

member.name: M:ChildSealed.Show
member.summary: Sealed override method that cannot be overridden further.

member.name: T:Circle
member.summary: Class representing a circle with radius and computed area. Demonstrates constructors and read-only properties.

member.name: M:Circle.#ctor(System.Double)
member.summary: Constructor for Circle class.

member.name: P:Circle.Area
member.summary: Gets the area of the circle. Computed as π * r².

member.name: T:Dog
member.summary: Derived class representing a dog. Inherits from Animal and adds Bark method. Demonstrates single inheritance.

member.name: M:Dog.Bark
member.summary: Method for the dog to bark.

member.name: T:DogOverride
member.summary: Derived class that overrides the Sound method. Demonstrates method overriding.

member.name: M:DogOverride.Sound
member.summary: Overrides the virtual Sound method from AnimalOverride. Calls base method and adds dog-specific sound.

member.name: T:EmployeeDirectory
member.summary: Class demonstrating indexers. Allows accessing employees by ID or name.

member.name: F:EmployeeDirectory.employees
member.summary: Dictionary to store employees: ID -> Name

member.name: P:EmployeeDirectory.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Indexer for accessing employee name by ID.

member.name: P:EmployeeDirectory.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Indexer for accessing employee ID by name.

member.name: T:EmployeeInheritance
member.summary: Derived class representing an employee. Inherits from Human and adds Work method. Demonstrates multilevel inheritance.

member.name: M:EmployeeInheritance.Work
member.summary: Method for working.

member.name: T:Engine
member.summary: Class representing an engine. Used in composition example.

member.name: M:Engine.Start
member.summary: Starts the engine.

member.name: T:GrandChild
member.summary: Attempted derived class from ChildSealed. Demonstrates that sealed methods cannot be overridden. The commented code would cause a compile-time error.

member.name: T:Human
member.summary: Derived class representing a human. Inherits from LivingBeing and adds Think method. Part of multilevel inheritance.

member.name: M:Human.Think
member.summary: Method for thinking.

member.name: T:IPrintable
member.summary: Interface for objects that can print. Demonstrates interface implementation.

member.name: M:IPrintable.Print
member.summary: Prints something.

member.name: T:IScannable
member.summary: Interface for objects that can scan. Demonstrates multiple interface implementation.

member.name: M:IScannable.Scan
member.summary: Scans something.

member.name: T:LivingBeing
member.summary: Base class representing a living being. Part of multilevel inheritance hierarchy.

member.name: M:LivingBeing.Breathe
member.summary: Method for breathing.

member.name: T:Machine
member.summary: Class representing a machine that can print and scan. Implements multiple interfaces. Demonstrates interface implementation.

member.name: M:Machine.Print
member.summary: Implements the Print method from IPrintable.

member.name: M:Machine.Scan
member.summary: Implements the Scan method from IScannable.

member.name: T:Marks
member.summary: Class demonstrating read-only indexer for marks array.

member.name: F:Marks.marks
member.summary: Array of marks.

member.name: P:Marks.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Read-only indexer to access marks by index.
member.returns: The mark at the specified index.

member.name: T:ParentHiding
member.summary: Base class for method hiding example.

member.name: M:ParentHiding.Show
member.summary: Method that will be hidden in derived class.

member.name: T:ParentSealed
member.summary: Base class with virtual method. Demonstrates sealed methods.

member.name: M:ParentSealed.Show
member.summary: Virtual method that can be overridden.

member.name: T:Person
member.summary: Base class representing a person. Demonstrates inheritance with constructors.

member.name: F:Person.Name
member.summary: The name of the person.

member.name: M:Person.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor for Person class. Initializes the Name property.

member.name: T:Program
member.summary: Main program class demonstrating various OOP concepts including properties, inheritance, interfaces, etc.

member.name: M:Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Entry point of the console application. Demonstrates creating objects, setting properties, displaying results, and various inheritance concepts.

member.name: T:Rectangle
member.summary: Class representing a rectangle. Demonstrates auto-implemented properties and expression-bodied properties.

member.name: P:Rectangle.Length
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of the rectangle.

member.name: P:Rectangle.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the rectangle.

member.name: P:Rectangle.Area
member.summary: Gets the area of the rectangle. Computed as Length * Width.

member.name: T:Security
member.summary: Sealed class that cannot be inherited. Demonstrates sealed classes to prevent inheritance.

member.name: T:Student
member.summary: Class representing a student with properties for name, age, marks, etc. Demonstrates encapsulation, properties, validation, and computed properties.

member.name: M:Student.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructor for Student class. Initializes all properties with validation.

member.name: T:StudentCollection
member.summary: Class demonstrating a custom indexer with validation.

member.name: F:StudentCollection.students
member.summary: Array to store student names.

member.name: P:StudentCollection.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Indexer for accessing students with bounds checking.
member.returns: The student name at the index.

member.name: T:StudentInheritance
member.summary: Derived class representing a student. Inherits from Person and adds RollNo. Demonstrates inheritance with constructor chaining using base().

member.name: F:StudentInheritance.RollNo
member.summary: The roll number of the student.

member.name: M:StudentInheritance.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructor for StudentInheritance class. Calls base constructor to initialize Name, then initializes RollNo.
member.param: The roll number of the student.

member.name: T:Vehicle
member.summary: Base class representing a vehicle. Demonstrates basic inheritance where derived classes can inherit methods.

member.name: M:Vehicle.Start
member.summary: Starts the vehicle. This method can be inherited by derived classes.
